attributes.review: as a lifelong trump supporter, i’m saddened to say that this app simply did not do it for me😒😒. every time i open it, the app fails to load. instead, im faced with a barrage of frightening images soundtracked my mike pence shouting homophobic slurs at me. very disappointing. i had even downloaded the app on my daughter’s phone, and this “loading screen” has sent her into hysterics.
attributes.title: very sad. very bad.

attributes.review: Asked for my phone number on the first page and wouldn’t let me get past it 🤬 I just wanted to support MY PRESIDENT without all those darn TEXT messages. Surely the libs hacked. DON’T DOWNLOAD.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE experience

attributes.review: Design needs improvement. Don’t recommend using. Requires personal information.
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I keep seeing pictures of a rotten orange in a suit and sometimes naked and I’m really confused and scared, has anyone else had a similar experience or not?
attributes.title: mom pick me up I’m scared

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and finally realize it idolized a pedophilic, racist, dumb pig. Wish I could give it 0 stars. He told me to go back to my country if I don’t like him, I’m from Arizona.
attributes.title: Trash

attributes.review: I thought I was a good Christian woman who loved this country and our president. I’ve recently discovered Donald J Trump is a rapist. As a somewhat intelligent human being, I can no longer support him. Also, ACAB.
attributes.title: I’ve made a mistake

attributes.review: At least someone thought it would be good to include an age restriction because some people can’t control themselves around minors
attributes.title: Yikes

attributes.review: Horrible app, this scary looking orange monster figure keeps popping up on my screen... does this mean it gave me a virus? Too many glitches I now have nightmares
Trump is the man. 4 more years buckle up Dems
attributes.title: Best app on the market
